SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.POLL_ID, A.POLL_NM, A.POLL_BGNDE POLL_BEGIN_DE, A.POLL_ENDDE POLL_END_DE, A.POLL_KND POLL_KIND_CODE, A.POLL_DSUSE_ENNC, A.POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLMANAGE A WHERE 1=1
AND POLL_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

) T0 ) Z WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
